channel.title: Atos on Anil Goyal
channel.description: Recent content in Atos on Anil Goyal

item.title: Atos Codex
item.description: Atos Codex is a fully integrated and cross market end-to-end analytics solution that enables organizations to maximize the value of their data quickly and cost efficiently. Atos Codex provides data analytics end-to end along the complete IT value chain.

item.title: Atos Iot management System
item.description: The Internet of things (IoT) is the network of physical devices, vehicles, home appliances, and other items embedded with electronics, sensors, actuators, and network connectivity which enable these objects to connect and exchange data. In Atos iot management we collect data from various sensors devices and apply various rules on this data for smooth functioning of that device. We also provide real time dashboard and analytics of devices and data.

item.title: FOS
item.description: IT Self-Service Portal is designed to provide ease-of-use and make IT Self Service available anywhere and anytime for the user. This Portal helps the users to create/ view/ update tickets, request, incidents, and change order. It empowers Self-Service function that helps the users to perform tasks and resolve issues by themselves. This Portal provides enhanced user experience with a modern aesthetics, better user interface and is rich in functionality.
